page.title: 08 THE MILL
page.content: We interviewed Mr Shaw the present owner of the now disused mill. He said that the Mill was closed down in 1947. Mr Shaw came to the Mill in 1960, 25 years ago. The oldest part of the Mill dates back to the 18th century. It was used to grind barley and wheat for flour. It was also used to make cider with the water wheel. The water wheel is still visible. Mr Shaw now uses the Old Mill as a base for his woodwork. Several of the residents of the village remember the Mill when it was still working and was also used as a bakery.
